duties_responsibilities.duty: Interview patients or their representatives to obtain patient demographic information.
Secure insurance information, eligibility, benefits, and authorizations.
Work closely with all facets of the Admitting department, including PBX operator function and reception areas.
Operate a computer to input and retrieve data.
Communicate with the population served, utilizing age-specific techniques.
Complete special projects or other assignments within specified timeframes.

education_certification.credential: High School Graduate or GED Equivalent
